evidence.claim: Codice Tech utilizes AWS for cloud infrastructure solutions.
The company integrates FHIR for healthcare data exchange.
Codice Tech supports HL7 standards for interoperability in health data.
The organization employs X12 for electronic data interchange in healthcare.
The use of RESTful APIs is highlighted in Codice Tech's developer documentation.

icp.icp_reason: Focus on X12 transactions and API automation in healthcare data exchange.
